H0.text: In which city did Field Marshal Freidrich Paulus surrender in January 1943. Stalingrad

H1.text: In which city did Field Marshal Freidrich Paulus surrender in January 1943. Moscow

H2.text: In which city did Field Marshal Freidrich Paulus surrender in January 1943. Leningrad

H3.text: In which city did Field Marshal Freidrich Paulus surrender in January 1943. Caricyn

A4.text: Paulus surrendered in Stalingrad on 31 January 1943.

A5.text: The surrender took place in Stalingrad, not Moscow.
